cards.name: Doran Martell
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons and remove it from the challenge. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains or loses a challenge icon of your choice.

cards.name: Ellaria Sand
cards.text: Reaction: After Ellaria Sand is declared as an attacker, choose up to 3 characters controlled by the defending player. Each of those characters must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able.

cards.name: The Red Viper
cards.text: Intimidate. The Red Viper gets +1 STR for each power he has. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Bastard character, The Red Viper gains 1 power.

cards.name: Darkstar
cards.text: Intimidate. Action: During a challenge in which Darkstar is attacking, sacrifice him to return each participating character to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Obara Sand
cards.text: Challenges Action: Return a Sand Snake character to your hand to put a [martell] character with lower printed cost into play from your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Areo Hotah
cards.text: Ambush (6). Reduce the cost to ambush Areo Hotah by 1 for each plot in your used pile. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Areo Hotah is defending, return him to your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot by 1 until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Nymeria Sand
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose dominance, discard 1 card at random from the winning opponent's hand and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Tyene Sand
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel a Sand Snake character to put Tyene Sand into play from your hand.

cards.name: Nymeria's Guard
cards.text: No attachments. Challenges Action: Pay 4 gold and stand a Sand Snake character to put Nymeria's Guard into play from your hand.

cards.name: Obella Sand
cards.text: Reaction: After Obella Sand is discarded for [intrigue] claim or killed for [military] claim, move 1 power from the winning opponent's faction card to your own. Shuffle Obella Sand from your discard or dead pile into your deck.

cards.name: Quentyn Martell
cards.text: Renown. Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, if there are fewer than 3 plot cards in your used pile, kneel Quentyn Martell.

cards.name: Ser Cletus Yronwood
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Increase the initiative value on your revealed plot card by 1 for each plot card in your used pile.

cards.name: Loreza Sand
cards.text: Interrupt: When a unique [martell] character you control is killed, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Maester Kedry
cards.text: Action: Kneel Maester Kedry to reduce the gold cost of the next event you play this phase by 2.

cards.name: House Dayne Escort
cards.text: While there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile, you may marshal House Dayne Escort from your discard pile as if it were in your hand.

cards.name: Shadow City Bastard
cards.text: Ambush (3). Challenges Action: Sacrifice Shadow City Bastard to choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that characters loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon.

cards.name: Dorne
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, and place the other on the bottom of your deck. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: Starfall
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Starfall to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.

cards.name: Hotah's Axe
cards.text: Attached character gets +3 STR. Reaction: After a [martell] character enters play during the challenges phase, put Hotah's Axe into play from your hand, attached to that character.

cards.name: Patience
cards.text: Character you control only. Challenges Action: Return attached character to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Beguiled
cards.text: Terminal. Challenges Action: Kneel Beguiled to have attached character lose a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

cards.name: No Use For Grief
cards.text: Play only if a [martell] character was killed under your control this round. Action: Search your deck for a Sand Snake character with printed cost 3 or lower, put it into play, and shuffle your deck. (Printed cost 6 or lower instead if The Red Viper is in your dead pile.)

cards.name: False Plans
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose an opponent. That player discards 1 card at random from his or her hand. Reaction: After False Plans is discarded for [intrigue] claim, the winning opponent discards 2 cards at random from his or her hand.

cards.name: To The Spears!
cards.text: Play only if there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile. Challenges Action: Each [martell] character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the next challenge you initiate this phase.

cards.name: Ser Cortnay Penrose
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which Ser Cortnay Penrose is participating, stand him.

cards.name: Sea Dragon Tower
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Sea Dragon Tower to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [power] icon.

cards.name: Fleet From Pyke
cards.text: No attachments. Pillage. Reaction: After a character you control discards a location or attachment using pillage, Fleet From Pyke gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Plundered
cards.text: Opponent's location only. Terminal. Reaction: After attached location's controller loses a challenge as the defending player, kneel attached location. Then, you may sacrifice Plundered to gain 3 gold.

cards.name: Myrcella Baratheon
cards.text: Myrcella Baratheon does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent with fewer cards in his or her hand than you.

cards.name: Extortion
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, gain 3 gold and return up to 3 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to the treasury.

cards.name: Spare Boot
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose an attachment attached to a character you control. Stand that attachment and move it to Spare Boot. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Turncloak
cards.text: Non-loyal character only. Terminal. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, take control of attached character. (Any player may initiate this ability.)

cards.name: Greatjon Umber
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which Greatjon Umber is attacking, if there are fewer than 3 plot cards in your used pile, stand him.

cards.name: Taste For Flesh
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Direwolf character or an attacking character with a Direwolf attachment, choose and kill a defending character.

cards.name: Missandei
cards.text: Interrupt: When Missandei is discarded from your hand or deck, put her into play instead of placing her in your discard pile.

cards.name: Qarth
cards.text: Action: Kneel Qarth and pay 1 gold to choose an attachment attached to a card you control and discard it from play.

cards.name: Leyton Hightower
cards.text: Action: Kneel Leyton Hightower to put a non-limited [tyrell] card with printed cost 4 or lower into play from your hand knelt.

cards.name: Beacon of the South
cards.text: [tyrell] character only. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR in which attached character is attacking, it gains 1 power.

cards.name: Val
cards.text: Reaction: After Val is declared as an attacker, put a Wildling character with printed cost 4 or lower into play from your hand knelt, participating as an attacker.

cards.name: Septon Meribald
cards.text: Action: Kneel Septon Meribald to choose and stand up to 3 characters with printed STR 1 or lower. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Oldtown Scholar
cards.text: Reaction: After an opponent draws 1 or more cards, if it is not the draw phase, kneel Oldtown Scholar to draw that many cards.

cards.name: Jade Sea Dromond
cards.text: Limited. Dominance Action: Kneel and sacrifice Jade Sea Dromond to choose a non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower and discard it from play. +1 Income.

cards.name: Brother's Robes
cards.text: The Seven character only. Reaction: After attached character is knelt, choose a location or attachment. Until the end of the phase, treat that card as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: "Off To Gulltown"
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: The Wars To Come
cards.text: Your plot deck must be exactly 10 cards. You may include a second copy of up to 2 different cards in your plot deck.

cards.name: At Prince Doran's Behest
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose and reveal a new plot card. (Cannot be canceled.)

cards.name: Peace and Prosperity
cards.text: Reduce the cost of the first character you marshal this round by 3, the first location your marshal this round by 2, and the first attachment you marshal this round by 1.

cards.name: Forced March
cards.text: When Revealed: Each opponent kneels 1 character he or she controls with a [military] icon. Then, you may kneel a character with a [military] icon to initiate this effect again.

cards.name: Beyond Reproach
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player sacrifices each attachment that is attached to a character he or she does not control.

cards.name: Breaking Ties
cards.text: Action: Sacrifice a loyal character to choose a non-loyal character or location and return it to its owner's hand. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Grand Melee
cards.text: Each character that is attacking or defending alone does not contribute its STR to the challenge.

cards.name: False Spring
cards.text: When Revealed: Each opponent chooses and reveals 3 cards from his or her hand, if able. You may choose and discard 1 revealed card from any number of those hands.
